articles.title: Covid: Europe set for ‘long period of tranquillity’ in pandemic, says WHO - The Guardian
articles.description: Vaccinations, milder Omicron and arrival of spring should keep death rate low as cases rise to all time high
articles.content: Europe could soon enter a long period of tranquillity that amounts to a ceasefire in the pandemic thanks to the less severe Omicron variant, high levels of immunity and the arrival of warmer spring w… [+2694 chars]

articles.title: Boris Johnson rushes Downing Street clearout after losing top ally - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Long-serving Johnson ally quits, prompting other exits from PM’s team.
articles.content:
LONDON Boris Johnson’s premiership has looked wobbly for weeks. On Thursday the wheels in the form of a string of top aides really started to come off.

articles.title: Mars-bound astronauts can avoid aggression, muscle loss with hibernation during trips - Republic World
